description: Detects Executables in the Downloads folder without FileVersion,Description,Product,Company likely created with py2exe Author: Markus Neis, Sander Wiebing. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious File Characteristics Due to Missing Fields
query: (winlog.event_data.Description:"\?" AND (FileVersion:"\?" OR Product:"\?" OR Company:"\?") AND process.executable:*\\Downloads\\*)
